attributes.action: Make the Government take notice of Petitions.
attributes.additional_details: Many petitions have been ignored for instance Should Donald Trump be allowed to come to the UK for a State visit.
attributes.background: The Government are choosing to ignore petitions. This petition is for petitions to be noticed.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
